content: this endearing crochet basket​ is a great way to stash stuff while enjoying a whimsical accent stitched in lily sugar n cream this lidded toadstool basket can be worked up quickly in rounds using any colors you like for added durability the yarn is held triple as you work pattern also features half-double_crochet and appliqué techniques measuring 7 x 8 excluding lid this graphic basket is perfectly sized to hold all sorts of small items
